Superior Craftsmanship

Each treasure box is crafted with precision, using high-quality materials for enhanced durability and appearance.

Support Our Canine Friends

Your contributions make a real difference in the lives of dogs across the nation. Each donation helps provide shelter, food, and care to those in need.

  • $50 feeds a shelter dog for a month.
  • $100 covers veterinary costs for one rescue.
  • $200 supports the construction of new shelters.

Explore The Traditional Shadow Box

Perfect for Your Home & Office

The Traditional Shadow Box

$199.00

This expertly crafted shadow box is designed to display and preserve your treasured memories, making it ideal for historical artifacts, penny books, and more.

View All Shadow Boxes
Dimensions & Build
  • Size: 16x20 inches - ample space for various collectibles.
  • Material: Crafted from solid wood with high-definition glass.
  • Mounting: Includes robust hanging materials for safe wall mounting.
Aesthetic Details
  • Finish: Multiple finishes available to match any decor.
  • Design: Classic and versatile, enhancing any room's aesthetics.
  • Customization: Frame and glass type customization options available.
Ordering Information
  • Shipping: Same-day dispatch for orders by 11 AM CT.
  • Pricing: Competitively priced at $199.00, with premium packaging included.
  • Warranty: Comes with a 1-year warranty covering materials and craftsmanship.
